structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: The board of trustees shall make a full report to the General Assembly, within the first month of each even-numbered-year regular session, of the condition and operation of the university since the date of the previous report, with such recommendations concerning the university as are deemed necessary.
law.history: Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 21, effective June 21, 2001. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4527-26.
